definition: A small creature that typically has a long, segmented body and many legs, often found crawling on plants or trees. It undergoes a metamorphosis to transform into a different form later in its life cycle. It is commonly associated with the natural world and is frequently observed in gardens, forests, and other outdoor environments.

examples.german: Die Raupe verwandelt sich in einen Schmetterling.
examples.english: The caterpillar transforms into a butterfly.

examples.german: Die Raupe kriecht auf dem Boden.
examples.english: The caterpillar crawls on the ground.
